item.description:
From Tolland County Ron Paul Meetup member Alex B:

"There is an Obama rally on campus this friday Fed 2nd at 2:00 pm. I think it would be cool if we could get some extra sign wavers there for RP. I will be there along with some other students probably- so that will give us some, but I don't know if any other Tolland Meetup members would be interested in coming or not."

The rally will be in the Student Union Ballroom - The Student Union is directly across the street from the Student Recreation Facility and Gampel Pavilion. The Ballroom is on the third floor, listed as rooms 330 & 331.
item.name: Ron Paul counter-rally at UConn....
